ai-patthana24.16:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: Protector of the World, circumstances, and tangledges of clothes.
ai-patthana24.16:0.3_0: wrapped with poisonous knives and associated with knots.
ai-patthana24.16:1.1_0: Not for the sake of refuge, with the cause and conditioned by the reason.
ai-patthana24.16:1.1_1: Not cause or reasoning a teaching with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana24.16:1.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana24.16:3.1_0: You don’t give rise to a teaching for the sake of refuge. You don’t give rise to a cause or reason.
ai-patthana24.16:3.1_1: Not for the sake of refuge arises dependent on the teaching, and for the sake of refuge, with no cause or reason.
ai-patthana24.16:3.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana24.16:4.1_0: ... results in the same way each case.
